For purposes of alphabetization of the bibliographical references, the particles ‘de’, ‘du’, and ‘van’ are considered to be part of the surname; the particle ‘von’ is not. In the case of multiple works by a single author, works are listed in chronological order by the date of the first edition, although I generally cite the latest edition. Works edited by a given author follow works written by that author, regardless of chronological sequence
